alert.note: Alert for Garland; Hot Spring; Saline (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 09 at 12:00AM CST until December 09 at 12:15AM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 AM CST FOR CENTRAL GARLAND...NORTHWESTERN SALINE AND NORTH CENTRAL HOT SPRING COUNTIES... At 1200 AM CST, a group of severe thunderstorms were located near Piney in Garland County, or 8 miles west of Hot Springs, and the other east of Mountain Pine, both moving east at 35 mph. The storm now east of Mountain Pine has a history of producing up to ping pong ball sized hail. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Hot Springs... Hot Springs Village... Mountain Pine... Hot Springs Memorial Field... Jessieville... Lake Ouachita State Park... Rockwell... Hot Springs National Park... Magnet Cove... Red Oak... Oaklawn Racetrack... Sunshine... Mountain Valley... Royal... Lake Catherine State Park... Gulpha Gorge... Hempwallace... HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
